import { faMinus, faPlus, faTrash } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import React from "react"; import { Modal, Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import { numberWithCommas } from "../utils/utils"; const ModalKeranjang = ({ showModal, handleClose, keranjangDetail, jumlah, keterangan, tambah, kurang, changeHandler, handleSubmit, totalHarga }) => { if (keranjangDetail) { return ( {keranjangDetail.product.nama}{" "}

Rp.{numberWithCommas(keranjangDetail.product.harga)}

total harga

Rp.{numberWithCommas(keranjangDetail.totalHarga)}

jumlah:
{jumlah} keterangan: changeHandler(event)} />
); } else { return ( kosong kosong ); } }; export default ModalKeranjang;
